descriptionHtml:
Fixsmith 2.2 allow to :
- correct bugs / incoherences / oversights / lacks of the vanilla smithing system.
- discover new recipes by progressing through the main quests of the game.
- smith better, enchantable and improvable versions of vanilla weapons and armors to no longer have to choose between appearance and efficiency.
- smith new original items from modders community creations.

[u][b]Last update : ( 12/02/2012 )[/b][/u]

- updated the dragonbone sword, bow and warhammer with new models
- added an archmage sword ( unenchanted, and enchanted ) based on glamring ( LOTR gandalf sword )
- revamped the hunting system, pelts and tusks worth more golds, animals can now drop high quality pelts
- backpacks recipes now need high quality pelts
- changed some books locations ( ex: the DB book is sold by babette now )


[u][b]Installation :[/b][/u]
First, you have to decompress the files in the \"data\" directory of the game. Second, you have to activate the mod named fixsmith.esp with the launcher of Skyrim.


[u][b]Full description :[/b][/u]

[b]Modifications :[/b]
- Dragonplate armor is now better than the daedric one.
- Steel smithing perk becomes common materials smithing perk. So the perk bonus can now apply to hide, leather, iron etc... armors too.
- Revamped the hunting system, pelts and tusks worth more golds, animals can now drop high quality pelts


[b]Added recipes :[/b]

[u]Misc Items / Jewelry :[/u]
- Lockpicks
- Flawless gems
- Arrows
- Circlets

[u]Dragon :[/u]
- dragon bone weapons and arrows

[u]Shadow guild :[/u]

- Armor of discretion
- Armor of stealth
- Master of shadows armor
- Armor of the savage shadow

You\'ll need a the book \"The art of dark leather\" in your inventory. The book is sold by Tonilia, the fence of the shadow guild headquarters.

[u]Nightingale :[/u]

- Nightingale armor
- Nightingale blade
- Nightingale bow

You\'ll need the book \"Nightingale armory\" in your inventary. It is located in the nightingale hall.

[u]Dark brotherhood :[/u]

- Armor of the bloody hand
- Armor of somber intentions
- Black sacrement Armor
- Shrouded robe ( until master level )
- Sorcerer of Sithis robe ( archmage level )
- Blade of woe

You need the book named \"Sibyl armors\" in your inventory sold by Babette in the dark brotherhood sanctuary.
Babette now sells rare ingredients ( human flesh, human heart, sibyl cristals ).
Sithis marks can be looted from black sacrement victims.

[u]Ancient nord / draugr :[/u]

- Dova steel armor
- Dova steel mail armor
- Dova steel sword
- Dova steel greatsword
- Dova steel battleaxe
- Dova steel waraxe
- Dova steel bow

You will need the book called \"Hagen\'s journal\" found in the Forelhost stronghold.

[u]The Companions :[/u]

- Armor of the companion
- Armor of the herald
- Shield of Ysgramor
- Axe of Ysgramor

You can only forge companions armor and weapons at the skyforge. To smith the Ysgramor weapons, you need the book \"Our smithing gifts\" located in the Ysgramor\'s Tomb. To make the hircine blood you need to equip and use the hircine sacrificial dagger at the tanning rack.

[u]The Blades :[/u]

- Akaviri scout armor, shield and sword
- Akaviri soldier armor, shield and sword
- Akaviri officer armor, shield and sword


You will need a book called \"Akaviri knowledge\" found in the Sky Haven Temple.

[u]College of Winterhold :[/u]

- Archmage outfit
- Archmage sword ( based on Glamring, the LOTR Gandalf\'s sword ) enchanted, and unenchanted.
- All robes of all grades of all magical colleges.
- All wands.
- Hoods
- Boots
- Bracers

You will need the book \"College of Winterhold equipment, v1\" to craft the common stuff, it is sold by Urag at the Arcaneum.
You will need the book \"College of Winterhold equipment, v2\" to craft the archmage stuff, you\'ll found it in the archmage chamber.

[u]Bards College :[/u]

- Raven outfit ( From the witcher ), Triss outfit for females, Geralt outfit for males
- 10 backpacks from different pelts to improve your carry weigth.

You\'ll need the book \"Good bards essential equipment\" found in the Bards College reading room.


[u]About ingredients :[/u]

- Feathers are sold at any misc merchant like Lucan in Riverwood, or can be found on chickens and hawks.
- Sibyl crystals are looted on hagravens and sold by babette ( dark brotherhood ).
- Dragon soul gems are looted on draugr sorcerers.
- Oak is sold in Markath, elm is sold in Riften, and yew is sold in all other blacksmithes of Skyrim.
- The archery in Solitude and the goods merchant in Winterhold sell all the type of wood.


[u]Language :[/u]
- English
- French

[u]Credits :[/u]
- theycallmecheese for dragon bone weapons models - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8863
- AmethystDeceiver for black sacrement armor - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5696
- Isilmeriel pour l\'épée d\'archimage - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6687
- solidus2845 for the barbarian thief armor
- Samutz for the TESSnip tutorial
- surfernet for \"Dark Brotherhood -silent-\" textures used for the armor of somber intentions
- TheGreenLion for \"Ancient nord armore - chainmail\" textures used in the destruction of any life armor set
- Els236 for the \"Els236s Ancient Nord Weapons Recolour\" textures used for the obsidian steel weapons
- MonsterMonkey for the \"Wolf armor remix male and female\" textures used for the armor set of the herald
- Thx to Fraper, CD Project, JarodCastle and hucifer for the witcher stuff

[u]History :[/u]

v2.2 : ( upd 12/02/2012 )
- updated the dragonbone sword, bow and warhammer with new models
- added an archmage sword ( unenchanted, and enchanted ) based on glamring ( LOTR gandalf sword )
- revamped the hunting system, pelts and tusks worth more golds, animals can now drop high quality pelts
- backpacks recipes now need high quality pelts
- changed some books locations ( ex: the DB book is sold by babette now )

v2.1 : 
- added sorcerer robes for the dark brotherhood
- added armor of black sacrement for the dark brotherhood
- added blade of woe for the dark brotherhood
- babette ( dark brotherhood ) now sells rare ingredients like human heart or sibyl cristals
- added multilangage support in prevision of the creation kit launch
- changed dye recipes to make them easier to be crafted
- steel forge perk covers now all common materials

v2.0 : 
- added receipes and ingredients to craft mage college outfits and wands
- added the raven outfit ( the witcher ) and backpacks for the bards college
- corrected a description bug in nightingale stuff

v1.9 : 
- added blades armor sets and weapons
- modified barbarian thief armor meshes and textures directories to prevent conflicts with other mods

v1.8 :
- added companion armor sets and weapons
- added Ysgramor\'s shield and axe
- added nightingale armor set and weapons
- added feathers to chickens and hawks
- fixed an animation bug when using the dragon bone weapons
- changed names of draugr stuff to match better with the skyrim lore

v1.7 : ( upd 22/12/2011 )
- added recipes for flawless gems
- fixed a bug that prevents the added leather armors to use the light armor perks bonuses
- modified the Steel Smithing perk into Leather and Steel Smithing to let the player take benefits of the improve bonuses for leather armors too
- fixed a display bug in the hagen\'s journal description

v1.6 : 
- added obsidian steel armors and weapons ( draugr )
- fixed armor of somber intentions display bug
- fixed a bug that prevents the player to buy or sell arrows
- moved the lockpicks to the misc category
- the book \"Sibyl armors\" can be found in the dawnstar sanctuary too ( for advanced game saves )

V1.5 : 
- added 1 new dark brotherhood armor set
- changed receipes of the dark brotherhood armors to fit their power

V1.4 : 
- added 1 dark brotherhood recipe

V1.3 : 
- added dragon bone weapons recipes.
- changed the arrows recipes to fit with the new dragon bone arrows recipe.
- changed dragonplate stats so it is more powerfull than the daedric one.

V1.2 : 
- added recipes to create and upgrade 4 shadow guild armor sets ( set of discretion, set of stealth, set of the master of shadows et set of the savage shadow ).

V1.1 :
- added recipes to create the circlets.

V1.0:
- allow to smith lockpicks and arrows.

( if you have any request like new recipes, don\'t hesitate to ask )
